metadata.title: CVE-2024-49568 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/smc: check v2_ext_offset/eid_cnt/ism_gid_cnt when receiving proposalmsgWhen receiving proposal msg in server, the fields v2_ext_offset/eid_cnt/ism_gid_cnt in proposal msg are from the remote clientand can not be fully trusted. Especially the field v2_ext_offset,once exceed the max value, there has the chance to access wrongaddress, and crash may happen.This patch checks the fields v2_ext_offset/eid_cnt/ism_gid_cntbefore using them.
